channel.title: Pages on My minimal Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on My minimal Hugo website

item.title: About
item.description: R user who enjoys analyzing financial data and making (unprofitable) trading algorithms.

item.title: Links
item.description: Official Hugo Website: Hugo is what I used to build this site. Blogdown Github Page: Awesome tool by Yihui Xie that makes it super easy to create Hugo pages using R Markdown directly from R Studio. Official R Studio Website: Free and open-source IDE for R. Includes everything you need for R-Markdown. R for Data Science (Grolemund, Wickham): Official website for Garrett Grolemund and Hadley Wickham’s awesome book. You can also buy a physical copy on Amazon.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can find me on: Facebook LinkedIn
